A library for simple local or distant plotting

A library for simple local or distant plotting

Lx Plot

Installation

Just add lx-plot.jar, jcommon-1.0.17.jar and jfreechart-1.0.14.jar in your classpath

Use

Refer to the examples java source files situated in the example directory. Examples are also included in the jar file in the following package

  • com.lxprl.plot.example
